document_data.mainbody:
urck was a lieutenant of the Cult of the Dragon circa 1369 DR during the occupation of the ruins of Myth Drannor, stationed in the Elven Catacombs underneath Castle Cormanthor.
In 1369 DR, a fellow commander of the Cult, Galibel communicated with Lieutenant Jurck via messenger-carried letters. In one such communication Galibel expressed concerns over something or someone big tearing through previous nights patrol of soulless drow slaves and taking off with the Cults wizards body. Galibel requested to switch duties with Jurcks team in the Elven Catacombs in an attempt to catch the mysterious perpetrator.
